name: Test Jam
description:
WELCOME TO Dear Mystic!

In a fantastical modern-day world where sirens enrapture entire rock concert venues, vampires teach astronomy, hellions star in blockbuster films, and humans and specters strike up unlikely friendships, you play as an empath who decides that their powers better suit helping people than writing bland news adverts. The catch? You have one week to impress your boss with your readership, so that you don't have to go back to suffocating in those ad columns.

Customize your name, race, online persona, and start cultivating your blog today! Many readers await your advice...and a whole world and its cast await your exploration.
